name: Account Intelligence Stack
description: Comprehensive B2B account intelligence integrated with Microsoft Copilot Studio, Dynamics 365, Microsoft Graph, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, and Azure OpenAI. Provides stakeholder analysis, competitive intelligence, meeting prep, risk assessment, and deal tracking.
features: Buying committee analysis with influence scoring
Competitive threat detection and battle cards
Prioritized action planning (Impact x Urgency x Ease)
benefits: 15-20 hours saved per week per sales rep
20-30% larger deal sizes through better intelligence
50% faster account research and meeting prep
Early warning system prevents deal slippage

components.name: account_intelligence_orchestrator.py
components.description: Main orchestrator that routes requests to specialized sub-agents and integrates with Copilot Studio
components.role: Primary entry point and routing engine

components.name: stakeholder_intelligence_agent.py
components.description: Analyzes buying committees, relationship health, and stakeholder profiles using Dynamics 365, Microsoft Graph, and LinkedIn

components.name: competitive_intelligence_agent.py
components.description: Detects competitive threats and generates battle cards using Azure AI Search and market intelligence

components.name: meeting_prep_agent.py
components.description: Synthesizes all intelligence into executive meeting briefs with scripts, questions, and objection handling

components.name: messaging_agent.py
components.description: Generates personalized messages (LinkedIn, email) using Azure OpenAI and stakeholder context

components.name: risk_assessment_agent.py
components.description: Predicts deal risks and win probability across relationship, competitive, process, and timing dimensions

components.name: action_prioritization_agent.py
components.description: Generates prioritized action plans using Impact x Urgency x Ease framework with hour-by-hour battle plans

components.name: deal_tracking_agent.py
components.description: Real-time deal dashboard with milestones, leading indicators, and early warning system

demo.title: Account Intelligence Stack - Interactive Demo
demo.description: 10-step interactive demonstration showing comprehensive account intelligence, stakeholder analysis, competitive battle cards, meeting preparation, risk assessment, and deal tracking for a $2.1M B2B deal.
demo.scenario: B2B sales rep managing complex renewal + expansion opportunity with new CTO, competitive threats, and tight timeline

conversational_triggers: Who are the key stakeholders at {account_name}?
What competitive threats do we face?
Prepare me for my meeting with {contact_name}
What are the risks to closing this deal?
